text:
For all websites using VirtualDocumentRoot, there's a bug that allow to list 
every directories in DocumentRoot.

Example
-------
DocumentRoot /home/mysite/www
VirtualDocumentRoot /home/mysite/%-3+

http://%20.mysite.com

And there is a listing of ALL directories in /home/mysite

How to fix it
-------------
Without modifying the source, you can set /home/mysite/.htacess to :
***[START]***
Options -Indexes
***[END]***
